items.title: Politician hauled out of live TV debate after being mistaken for vegan streaker
items.description: Kevin Nuijten bears an unfortunate resemblance to one of the Netherlands' most notorious activists.

items.title: Mystery of ‘crocodile’ spotted in UK river solved after police’s ‘strangest appeal ever’
items.description: Police in Derbyshire launched an appeal to find more clues about a crocodile in a river, only to discover the reptile was a stuffed taxidermy animal.

items.title: I’ve got the world’s longest name – it contains 2,253 unique words
Rightmove photoshop ad with cars glued on ‘by Pritt Stick’ is working, estate agent says
items.description: One user said: 'Seems right up my street. Have been looking for somewhere to park my cardboard vehicles for ages.'

items.title: As the NHS shares ‘benefits’ of first-cousin marriage — why is it still so controversial?
items.description: It's a taboo topic, but not as far as the law is concerned.
